title: Arafoo Kenja no Isekai Seikatsu Nikki - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Mature   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Angels   Cheats   Clever Protagonist   Evil Gods   Game Elements   Gods   Golems   Lack of Common Sense   Level System   Loli   Magic   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Monsters   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Phobias   Polygamy   Programmer   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Royalty   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Teachers   Transported into a Game World   Unlucky Protagonist   Unreliable Narrator
author: Yasukiyo Kotobuki
description:
Satoshi Osako was a player of the VRRPG 『Sword and Sorcery』 who defeated the Evil God and died for his troubles. When he awoke again he found himself in a strange unknown forest. Furthermore he possessed his avatar’s body and abilities. In other words, he was a cheat. Can a 40 year old guy, live peacefully in this world?

Let his otherworldly adventure begin!>
